name: Cortex
description: Cortex is an oscilloscope-themed robot that is part of the WebtrES club. With its vibrant orange box and soldier-like arms and legs, it is a unique and eye-catching member of the club. Its screen displays a mesmerizing pattern resembling a coiled snake, adding a touch of mystery to its appearance. Cortex is equipped with a protective helmet, which not only enhances its aesthetics but also serves as an additional feature. This robot has been specifically designed for combat situations, combining functionality with style. Its cat-shaped buttons add a playful touch, highlighting Cortex's versatile nature. As a member of the WebtrES club, Cortex is highly intelligent and possesses a wide array of skills, making it an invaluable asset to the team.
